title: As West goes after Russia’s oil fleet, Moscow fears for its war funding
summary_full: New European measures to crack down on Russia’s shadow fleet could severely hurt its economy at a time when it is looking increasingly vulnerable.
summary_public: New European measures to crack down on Russia’s shadow fleet could severely hurt its economy at a time when it is looking increasingly vulnerable.

RU.label: negative
RU.evidence: New European measures to crack down on Russia’s shadow fleet could severely hurt its economy
